comments:

All Extensions (Xerces, TPTP) are taken from the Calisto Update Site. I tried with newer (4.3) versions of TPTP, but nothing changed.

Would you please provide the following information?
- SUN JDK version?
- Are you using TPTP 4.2.1 instead of 4.2.2? I don't think 4.2.2 is released on Calisto Update site yet.
- Can you retry with a fresh workspace?

I tried reproduce the problem on a RHEL4.0 machine

with eclipse-SDK-3.2.1-linux.gtk.tar.gz
and run Help>Software Updates>Find and Install
and pick Callisto Update site, with TPTP and required plug-ins.

After Eclipse is update and relaunched, start profile a sample local Java application and no error is found.

I am using SUN JDK 1.4.2 as the JDK.

Can you retry with the lastest update? or a SUN JDK?
